annotations.description: Integrated scRNA-seq derived labels with scATAC-seq data by building a network of label-to-cell and cell-to-cell edges and diffusing label information over this combined network to compensate for data sparsity in single-cell data.

annotations.calculation: cell-to-cell edge weight using Jaccard similarity between cells
label-to-cell weight as sum of products of gene activity scores and log fold-change in expression of each marker for that cell label

annotations.tuning: label edge weight using cell homogeneity (as described in reference 17)

annotations.result: diffusion produced a vector of influence scores of each label for each cell

annotations.smoothing: smoothed influence vectors by taking weighted average of each cell's scores with those of its ten closest neighbours in UMAP space, where each neighbour contributed one-fifth as much as the cell in question

annotations.label_assignment: assigned cell-type labels using the label with the highest influence score for each cell
